message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob. It's a fair start!
Take a small share, let's negotiate further!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give up control!
I'm getting closer to my target, but I'm still willing to compromise. Let's meet in the middle!
You're getting close to your target, but I'm not going to give up yet! This is my final offer!
I'm going back to the 50/50 split, but I'm not negotiating further. Take it or leave it!
